screen_desc: The screenshot displays a sign-in page for Best Buy, aimed at returning customers. Users can enter their email address and password, with an option to show the password. There are alternative sign-in options using a Passkey, Apple ID, or Google account. A "Forgot your password?" link is also available, and users can choose to continue as a guest during checkout if they don’t have an account.
